titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Collection of Library Bookplates
titlestmt.author: Compiled by Sonja Foard

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 00:04

did.abstract: This collection contains institutional bookplates for a variety of libraries.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The Yale Bookplate Collection was formerly housed in Sterling Memorial Library. The collection was incorporated into the Arts of the Book Collection in 1984 and then moved to the Seeley G. Mudd Library in 1990. In 2011, it was transferred to the Robert B. Haas Family Arts Library.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Collection of Library Bookplates, Robert B. Haas Family Arts Library, Yale University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Similarly mounted materials have been kept together.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains institutional bookplates for a variety of libraries. A few bookplates for private patrons are also interspersed.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Organized into three series: I. Bookplates – Mounted. II. Bookplates – Unmounted. III. Bookplates – Donors.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged alphabetically by the name of the library or institution.

did.unittitle: Appalachian – Biblioteca Municipal, Rio de Janeiro
Bridge Memorial Library – Cambridge School for Girls

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder includes a typescript letter dated January 14, 1952, from Hamilton Vaughan Bail to Donald G. Wing.

did.unittitle: Maine – Massachusetts, Library of the General Court
Nahant – New York Yacht Club Library
Taylor Institution – University Club of Los Angeles
University College Library, Nottingham – University of Maryland
University of Michigan – Wolcott and Litchfield Circulating Library
Women's City Club of Boston – Yale Club of New York City
American Institute of Electrical Engineers – Wellsboro

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Loose bookplates arranged alphabetically by the name of the library or institution.

did.unittitle: Connecticut College for Women – Dublin, Greene's Library

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder includes two premium or prize bookplates.

did.unittitle: Historical Society of Pennsylvania – Musicians of Los Angeles

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder includes several examples of premium or prize bookplates.

did.unittitle: University of California – University of Rochester
United States Military Academy – Williams College
Wilson's Grammar School – Young Men's Christian Association

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged alphabetically by the name of the donor, either institution or individual.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder also includes an example of the personal ex-libris of George Henry Corey, designed and signed by Rockwell Kent.
